name: Node.Monster
description: Node.Monster delivers high-performance, scalable, secure node operations across 20+ networks, including ether.fi, Mezo, Symbiotic, Eigen Layer, Subquery, Forta, Axelar, Stride, NEAR, and more. We are a trusted leader in blockchain infrastructure with over $450M in staking AUM and $500M+ in restaking AUM.
